meanings.definition: The state of being free from illness or injury.
meanings.sent1: Her healthiness allowed her to enjoy life without any sickness or wounds.
meanings.sent2: Regular exercise and a balanced diet contribute to overall healthiness.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's secret power was her incredible healthiness, never getting hurt in battles.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a picture of healthiness, with vibrant flowers blooming everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The doctor emphasized the importance of maintaining healthiness through proper care and attention.

meanings.definition: The quality of promoting good health.
meanings.sent1: The healthiness of the food choices in the cafeteria improved student well-being.
meanings.sent2: The healthiness of the environment played a crucial role in the community's overall wellness.
meanings.sent3: The healthiness of the new gym equipment made exercising more enjoyable for everyone.
meanings.sent4: The healthiness of the air in the mountains invigorated the hikers during their trek.
meanings.sent5: The healthiness of the skincare products helped maintain a clear complexion.

meanings.definition: The condition of being in good physical or mental health.
meanings.sent1: His healthiness was evident in his energetic demeanor and positive outlook on life.
meanings.sent2: The healthiness of her mind and body allowed her to tackle challenges with confidence.
meanings.sent3: The healthiness of the team's spirit was contagious, lifting everyone's mood.
meanings.sent4: The healthiness of the relationship between the siblings was built on trust and understanding.
meanings.sent5: The healthiness of the workplace culture fostered productivity and employee satisfaction.
